cs340.client.servercommunivator

Class FakeProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs340.client.servercommunivator.FakeProxy

  • public class FakeProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete implementation of IServerProxy for use with no server in a testing situation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FakeProxy()
      constructs new ServerProxy

      • FakeProxy

    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        public boolean loginUser(JSONObject credentials)
                  throws ServerProxyException
        Checks the server to see if the given credentials are valid. If so it logs the user into the system
        Parameters:
        credentials - username and password
        Returns:
        whether or not it was successful
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • registerUser

        public boolean registerUser(JSONObject credentials)
                     throws ServerProxyException
        Creates a new account for the given credentials. It will also log the user into the system simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        credentials - username and password of new user
        Returns:
        whether or not it was successful
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • listGames

        public JSONObject listGames()
                     throws ServerProxyException
        Returns a list of all games currently in progress.
        Returns:
        A list of all games in progress if successful. Otherwise null
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection

      • createGame

        public JSONObject createGame(JSONObject createGameRequest)
                      throws ServerProxyException
        Creates a new game on the server with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        createGameRequest - Include the boolean options for a new game as well as the game name.
        Returns:
        description of newly created game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • joinGame

        public boolean joinGame(JSONObject joinGameRequest)
                 throws ServerProxyException
        Adds a user to a given game.
        Parameters:
        joinGameRequest - ID of game and color of user
        Returns:
        whether or not the user was successfully added
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • saveGame

        public boolean saveGame(JSONObject saveGameRequest)
                 throws ServerProxyException
        Saves the current state of the game. Should only be used for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        saveGameRequest - Game ID and file name to be saved under
        Returns:
        Whether or not it was able to save the game
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • loadGame

        public JSONObject loadGame(JSONObject loadGameRequest)
                    throws ServerProxyException
        Loads a previous game saved for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        loadGameRequest - file name of previously saved game
        Returns:
        The specified game from the file
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • getModel

        public JSONObject getModel(JSONObject versionNumber)
                    throws ServerProxyException
        Checks to see if the given model version is current. If so, it does nothing. Otherwise it returns the full game model.
        Parameters:
        versionNumber - optional check to see if model version is current
        Returns:
        the current state of the game or true if the model is current
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection or in request

      • reset

        public JSONObject reset()
                 throws ServerProxyException
        Returns a model of the state of a game right after the initial placement round if the game were the default. For server created games, the game reverts back to before the initial placement round.
        Returns:
        A reset game model
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with connection

      • getCommands

        public JSONObject getCommands()
                       throws ServerProxyException
        Gets a list of all the commands called in the game. Used for debugging purposes.
        Returns:
        A list of every command that has been executed in the game so far
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - problems with the connection

      • executeCommands

        public JSONObject executeCommands(JSONObject listOfCommands)
                           throws ServerProxyException
        Executes the given commands on the game. Ideally a game would have been restarted. This is for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        listOfCommands - Commands to be executed in the game
        Returns:
        Game model after the given commands have been applied
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - if a problem with connection or parameters

      • addAI

        public boolean addAI(JSONObject addAIRequest)
              throws ServerProxyException
        Adds an AI player to the current game
        Parameters:
        addAIRequest - type of AI to add to the game (only LARGEST_ARMY currently exists)
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - Not a valid AI Request, Connection error

      • listAI

        public JSONObject listAI()
                  throws ServerProxyException
        Returns the different type of AI players available
        Returns:
        A string array of different type of AI players
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException

      • sendChat

        public JSONObject sendChat(JSONObject sendChat)
                    throws ServerProxyException
        Sends a message to chat part of the model
        Parameters:
        sendChat - type, playerIndex and content
        Returns:
        An updated game model
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - Problem with connection or given command

      • rollNumber

        public JSONObject rollNumber(JSONObject rollNumber)
                      throws ServerProxyException
        Tells the server what number was rolled.
        Parameters:
        rollNumber - type(rollNumber), playerIndex and die number(2-12)
        Returns:
        An updated game model
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - Problem with connection or given command

      • robPlayer

        public JSONObject robPlayer(JSONObject robPlayer)
                     throws ServerProxyException
        Moves the robber and reallocates the robbed resource card, if there is one.
        Parameters:
        robPlayer - type(robPlayer), playerIndex, victimIndex and location
        Returns:
        An updated game model
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException - Problem with connection or given command

        Returns:
        An updated game model
        Throws:
        ServerProxyException
